name: The Strongest Hedgehog
description:
You play as an hedgehog who is captured by evil Heikki. He has thrown you in to a cell, from which you have to escape. And you have to defeat the evil Heikki, who is enemy of all hedgehogs. Can you make it?

Theme: The Strongest Hedgehog

Made by: Teemu, Janessa, Joonas
